name: Fenix
description:
This is a little game made in less than 48 hours made for a GameJam.

Game made with "https://nicoletacrivitchi.itch.io" as graphic designer.

You can see the lore of this game in "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2BZpiIV_Fy4" video.

The 1.1v. has fixed minor bugs with the canvas and the 'PJ' movement.
